特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Lecture. Group work.
For students permitted to take the course online, all materials will be provided via LUNA. Group work an in-class tests will be replaced with writing assignments.

トピック.授業計画1: All 14 classes will be taught face to face.
トピック.授業外学習2: The students are required to conduct an interview with someone they know, and then write a short report about that interview. The students will also need to study their notes before each of the tests.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【200】Culture and Thought／Culture and Thought
担当者: ヘファナン　ケビン（HEFFERNAN KEVIN MICHAEL）
